Text:
A bit of trouble to install this, but not hard for a geek like me.
I played this game in the arcade many years ago, but it looked a lot better than this. The resolution is so low you can't even see who you're shooting at. Thanks for the upload though.
Leisure Digital makes a newer version from this game with improved resolution (I think) and added mouse/lightgun support for the PC version.

download dosbox then:

example:

mount c "maddog"
imgmount d "maddog\image.img" -t iso -fs iso
d:
